duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage day-to-day operations of a travel consultant team, including key performance indicators (KPI), workload management, and providing assistance and coaching.
Act as the primary point of contact for team members, offering support, coaching, and development to ensure performance targets are met and exceeded.
Provide leadership to the team of travel consultants and collaborate with performance data to maximize effectiveness.
Develop learning programs to enhance competency and provide industry information to clients.
Maintain knowledge of travel industry regulations, global distribution systems (GDS), and monitor queues for quality control.
Monitor and ensure compliance with necessary regulations such as DOT, TSA, passports, visas, etc.
Collaborate with performance data to maximize the effectiveness of the team.
Maintain knowledge of necessary regulations (DOT, TSA, passports, visas, etc.)
Monitor global distribution systems (GDS) queues daily to maintain quality control.
Collaborate with performance data to maximize the effectiveness of the team.

education_certification.credential: Extensive experience in the corporate travel management industry
